divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling to St.Louis on U.S. 61 and some lights in sky got my attention. I was curious and perplexed at first but as I observed more it seemed there were two or three of them and they were interacting with each other and sometimes even lit up the ground like daylight. I became scared and pulled over to a friends to get off the road for a while. After an hour I returned to my car again the flashing lights,white, were in the sky but I continued my drive to DeSoto. I became lost twice, very unusual for me and frustrated me a great deal. Once I was turned around i drove upon a german shepard just sleeping in the road and I thought how strange as no one in the area owns one and to the right of my car I saw a huge ufo ,disc with one on top of the other ,blue and red lights and my car began to die. I panicked and tried to call 911 on my blackberry but it locked up completely and I could not reach anyone. I remember looking in the rear view and the dog just woke up and walked off the road. I was 4 days later coming home and along the way on 61 again a huge light came upon my car very fast and I was followed by a disc with green and yellow lights for a few minutes and then it flew off. Truly terrified and car has had electrical trouble since. I do have some footage on my blackberry.
Summary: Disc ,one on top of other, red, blue lights
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in St Louis
There were no other sightings in St Louis on or around July 16th 2009
